    • Method Detail

      • html

        public static ConditionList html()
        This static factory method create a ConditionList built to format an HTML message.
        Returns:
        an HTML ConditionList

      • plain

        public static ConditionList plain()
        This static factory method create a ConditionList built to format a plain text message.
        Returns:
        a plain text ConditionList

      • checkRequiredFields

        public static <T extends com.axelor.db.Model> void checkRequiredFields​(T object,
                                                                       java.util.function.Supplier<ConditionList> conditionListSupplier)
        This method will throw a plain text formatted exception in case of required null field in the given record.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the given record class type.
        Parameters:
        object - the record to check.
        conditionListSupplier - the supplier to create a new condition list to use.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - listing all required null fields.

      • checkReferences

        public static <T extends com.axelor.db.Model> void checkReferences​(T object,
                                                                   java.util.function.Supplier<ConditionList> conditionListSupplier,
                                                                   java.lang.String... ignores)
        This method will throw a plain text formatted exception in case of reference of the given record in any other records of any models.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the given record class type.
        Parameters:
        object - the record to check for references.
        conditionListSupplier - the supplier to create a new condition list to use.
        ignores - a list of model and field names to ignore. These parameters follow the format 'Model:field' (for example: Partner:employee).
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - in case of found reference.
